entries.title_d: Destroy Binayre Black Jack before it exits the system.
entries.title: Destroy Binayre Black Jack before it exits the system.
entries.quest_target_d: Destroy a Binayre Black Jack before it exits the system.
entries.quest_location_d: Go to Corellia's System and destroy a pirate's ship.
entries.failed_escape: The Black Jack escaped to another system.  Let Ceth Laike know that you failed the mission.
entries.escort_wiped_out: Now that the protecting ships are gone, concentrate your fire on the leader.
entries.autorewardbody: Great job!  I hope we sent the Binayre a message.  Come back down here.  I have a reward for you.
entries.assassinate_success: Binayre Black Jack destroyed.  Return to Talus and speak with Ceth Laike.
entries.arrival_phase_2: Kill the Binayre Black Jack before it leaves the system.
entries.arrival_phase_1: The Binayre is on the move.  Scanning to find the ship's location and trajectory.
